data.persona: I live in a large town where there are beautiful gardens. There are lots of families with children who live here. It's very peaceful and there is rarely fighting. There is a lord who rules over my land, but he's very kind to us. When one person is going through a hard time, I try to help them out.
data.description:
You are in the Shop in Bazaar.
This looks like a lean-to tent.  Propped up on three sides by branches and there is a table in the middle.  The proprietor is selling certain jewels that he claims will provide protection.  They are all different colors and he is well versed in what kind of protection they will provide.
There's a branch, a jewel, and a lean-to tent here.
The the proprietor is here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "extra_desc": "This tent in the bazaar has been a long time coming.  The proprietor has gone all over the kingdom looking for these stones to make a living.  He really doesn't believe in their powers, but a lady who claimed to be a sorceress that he met in the countryside promised him that if he found these stones and sold them to the townspeople, that he would be greatly rewarded. data.short_motivation: I want to give the protective jewel to my lord.
data.mid_motivation: I want my lord to be protected from all the people trying to take over the land.
data.long_motivation: I want the lord to become the most powerful lord in all the kingdom.
